verses.roman:
vipra bale,--ei tomāra darśana-prabhāve
tomā dekhi' gela mora ājanma svabhāve

synonyms: vipra bale—the brāhmaṇa replied; ei—this; tomāra darśana-prabhāve—by the influence of Your visit; tomā dekhi'-after seeing You; gela—went; mora—my; ā-janma—from childhood; svabhāve—nature.
translation: The brāhmaṇa replied, "This is all due to Your influence, sir. After seeing You, I have lost my lifelong practice.
